content: A lot of the moves will see the Chief attack with long sweeps or hitting the ground with its fists. Ripples of lava will often follow these attacks, so using the Fireproof Mantle will give you some protection against the fire damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Flint Chief'.
The content is as follows:
A lot of the moves will see the Chief attack with long sweeps or hitting the ground with its fists. Ripples of lava will often follow these attacks, so using the Fireproof Mantle will give you some protection against the fire damage.
